name: Timelapse Full Flight - East Midlands to Glasgow (Bombardier DHC8-Q400) GoPro
description:
Full flight Timelapse video from gate to gate onboard Flybe DHC8-Q400 G-ECOD, operating flight BE552 from East Midlands (EMA) to Glasgow (GLA) on 1 December 2014.  

The flight begins in the terminal at East Midlands, before we walk across the ramp to board our waiting aircraft.  Once on board, we push back from the gate and taxi out to runway 09 for a departure to the east.  With a low cloudbase we are in the cloud before we reach the other end of the runway, but soon emerge to a beautiful sunny day over Nottingham, the steam from Radcliffe-on-Soar power station clearly visible above the cloud.  It remains fairly cloudy for much of the flight up the country, however we get a brief view of the ground over the Lake District, before we begin our descent into Glasgow.  The cloudbase is a little higher in Glasgow, and we emerge from the clouds getting a good view over the outskirts of the city before landing onto runway 23 and taxying into the terminal after a flight time of 52 minutes.

Video taken from seat 7A.

Airline:  Flybe
Flight:  BE552
Aircraft:  Bombardier DHC8-Q400 G-ECOD
From:  East Midlands (EMA)
To:  Glasgow (GLA)
Departure:  08:59
Arrival:  09:51
Flight Time:  00:52
Seat:  7A
Flight Path:  http://goo.gl/L8fefB

Please enjoy the flight and feel free to subscribe/comment!

GoPro Hero 3

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
